subject: Golf
Athletics and Sports

Baseball
Masters Golf Tournament
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth is the fifth Masters tournament winner to be alone at the top of the leaderboard after each round. Other sports also have notable wire-to-wire champions.
snippet: Jordan Spieth is the fifth Masters tournament winner to be alone at the top of the leaderboard after each round. Other sports also have notable wire-to-wire champions.
